analytical.name: Analytical Thinker
analytical.description: You possess a keen mind that naturally breaks down complex problems into logical components. You value precision, data, and rational thinking.

creative.name: Creative Visionary
creative.description: You see the world through a unique lens, always finding innovative ways to express ideas and solve problems. You think outside conventional boundaries.

social.name: People Connector
social.description: You have a natural talent for understanding others and building meaningful relationships. You thrive in environments where you can help and collaborate.

enterprising.name: Dynamic Leader
enterprising.description: You have a natural drive to take initiative and lead projects or ventures. You're persuasive and enjoy taking calculated risks to achieve ambitious goals.

practical.name: Pragmatic Executor
practical.description: You excel at implementing solutions and bringing ideas to life. You focus on efficiency, results, and practical applications of knowledge.

investigative.name: Curious Investigator
investigative.description: You have a natural drive to understand how things work and to discover new knowledge. You enjoy research and deep intellectual challenges.

artistic.name: Expressive Artist
artistic.description: You have a strong aesthetic sense and a need to create and communicate through various artistic mediums. You value beauty and emotional expression.

conventional.name: Organized Systematizer
conventional.description: You excel at creating order from chaos and maintaining systems. You have attention to detail and appreciate clear structures and processes.

realistic.name: Hands-On Problem Solver
realistic.description: You prefer working with physical objects, tools, and machinery. You take a straightforward approach to solving problems and value tangible results.

adventurous.name: Courageous Explorer
adventurous.description: You seek excitement and new experiences. You're comfortable with risk and uncertainty, and you adapt quickly to changing situations.
